verses.verse: It is <S%G4851><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> expedient <S%G4851><s%> for me <S%G3427><s%> doubtless <S%G1211><s%> to glory <S%G2744><s%>. <S%G1063><s%> I will come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> visions <S%G3701><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> revelations <S%G602><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%>. I will come: Gr. For I will come

I knew <S%G1492><s%> a man <S%G444><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> above <S%G4253><s%> fourteen <S%G1180><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> ago <S%G4253><s%>, (whether <S%G1535><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%>, I cannot <S%G3756><s%> tell <S%G1492><s%>; or whether <S%G1535><s%> out <S%G1622><s%> of the body <S%G4983><s%>, I cannot <S%G3756><s%> tell <S%G1492><s%>: God <S%G2316><s%> knoweth <S%G1492><s%>;) such an one <S%G5108><s%> caught up <S%G726><s%> to <S%G2193><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> I knew <S%G1492><s%> such <S%G5108><s%> a man <S%G444><s%>, (whether <S%G1535><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%>, or <S%G1535><s%> out <S%G1622><s%> of the body <S%G4983><s%>, I cannot <S%G3756><s%> tell <S%G1492><s%>: God <S%G2316><s%> knoweth <S%G1492><s%>;)

How that <S%G3754><s%> he was caught up <S%G726><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> paradise <S%G3857><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> unspeakable <S%G731><s%> words <S%G4487><s%>, which <S%G3739><s%> it is <S%G1832><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> lawful <S%G1832><s%> for a man <S%G444><s%> to utter <S%G2980><s%>. lawful: or, possible

Of <S%G5228><s%> such an one <S%G5108><s%> will I glory <S%G2744><s%>: yet <S%G1161><s%> of <S%G5228><s%> myself <S%G1683><s%> I will <S%G2744><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> glory <S%G2744><s%>, but <S%G1508><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> mine <S%G3450><s%> infirmities <S%G769><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> though <S%G1437><s%> I would desire <S%G2309><s%> to glory <S%G2744><s%>, I shall <S%G2071><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be <S%G2071><s%> a fool <S%G878><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> I will say <S%G2046><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> now I forbear <S%G5339><s%>, lest <S%G3361><s%> any man <S%G5100><s%> should think <S%G3049><s%> of <S%G1519><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> above <S%G5228><s%> that which <S%G3739><s%> he seeth <S%G991><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> to be, or <S%G2228><s%> that he heareth <S%G191><s%> of <S%G5100><s%> <S%G1537><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> lest <S%G3363><s%> I should be exalted above measure <S%G5229><s%> through the abundance <S%G5236><s%> of the revelations <S%G602><s%>, there was given <S%G1325><s%> to me <S%G3427><s%> a thorn <S%G4647><s%> in the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, the messenger <S%G32><s%> of Satan <S%G4566><s%> to <S%G2443><s%> buffet <S%G2852><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>, lest <S%G3363><s%> I should be exalted above measure <S%G5229><s%>.
For <S%G5228><s%> this thing <S%G5127><s%> I besought <S%G3870><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> thrice <S%G5151><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> it might depart <S%G868><s%> from <S%G575><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> he said <S%G2046><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%>, My <S%G3450><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> is sufficient <S%G714><s%> for thee <S%G4671><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> strength <S%G1411><s%> is made perfect <S%G5048><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> weakness <S%G769><s%>. Most gladly <S%G2236><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> will I <S%G2744><s%> rather <S%G3123><s%> glory <S%G2744><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> infirmities <S%G769><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> the power <S%G1411><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> may rest <S%G1981><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> me <S%G1691><s%>.

Therefore <S%G1352><s%> I take pleasure <S%G2106><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> infirmities <S%G769><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> reproaches <S%G5196><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> necessities <S%G318><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> persecutions <S%G1375><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> distresses <S%G4730><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> Christ's <S%G5547><s%> sake <S%G5228><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> I am weak <S%G770><s%>, then <S%G5119><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> I strong <S%G1415><s%>.

I am become <S%G1096><s%> a fool <S%G878><s%> in glorying <S%G2744><s%>; ye <S%G5210><s%> have compelled <S%G315><s%> me <S%G3165><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> to have been commended <S%G4921><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> you <S%G5216><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> in nothing <S%G3762><s%> am I behind <S%G5302><s%> the very chiefest <S%G3029><s%> apostles <S%G652><s%> <S%G5228><s%>, though <S%G1499><s%> I be <S%G1510><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%>.

Truly <S%G3303><s%> the signs <S%G4592><s%> of an apostle <S%G652><s%> were wrought <S%G2716><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> wonders <S%G5059><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> mighty deeds <S%G1411><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is it <S%G2076><s%> wherein <S%G3739><s%> ye were inferior <S%G2274><s%> to <S%G5228><s%> other <S%G3062><s%> churches <S%G1577><s%>, except <S%G1508><s%> it be that <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> myself <S%G846><s%> was <S%G2655><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> burdensome <S%G2655><s%> to you <S%G5216><s%>? forgive <S%G5483><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> wrong <S%G93><s%>.

Behold <S%G2400><s%>, the third time <S%G5154><s%> I am <S%G2192><s%> ready <S%G2093><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>; and <S%G2532><s%> I will <S%G2655><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> be burdensome <S%G2655><s%> to you <S%G5216><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> I seek <S%G2212><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> yours <S%G5216><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> the children <S%G5043><s%> ought <S%G3784><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> to lay up <S%G2343><s%> for the parents <S%G1118><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> the parents <S%G1118><s%> for the children <S%G5043><s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> will very gladly <S%G2236><s%> spend <S%G1159><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> be spent <S%G1550><s%> for <S%G5228><s%> you <S%G5590><s%> <S%G5216><s%>; though <S%G1499><s%> the more abundantly <S%G4056><s%> I love <S%G25><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, the less <S%G2276><s%> I be loved <S%G25><s%>. for you: Gr. for your souls

But <S%G1161><s%> be it so <S%G2077><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> did <S%G2599><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> burden <S%G2599><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>: nevertheless <S%G235><s%>, being <S%G5225><s%> crafty <S%G3835><s%>, I caught <S%G2983><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> with guile <S%G1388><s%>.
Did I make a gain <S%G4122><s%> <S%G3361><s%> of you <S%G5209><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> of them <S%G846><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> I sent <S%G649><s%> unto <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>?

I desired <S%G3870><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> with him I sent <S%G4882><s%> a brother <S%G80><s%>. Did <S%G4122><s%> <S%G3387><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%> make a gain <S%G4122><s%> of you <S%G5209><s%>? walked we <S%G4043><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in the same <S%G846><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%>? walked we not <S%G3756><s%> in the same <S%G846><s%> steps <S%G2487><s%>?

Again <S%G3825><s%>, think ye <S%G1380><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> we excuse ourselves <S%G626><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>? we speak <S%G2980><s%> before <S%G2714><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>: but <S%G1161><s%> we do all things <S%G3956><s%>, dearly beloved <S%G27><s%>, for <S%G5228><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> edifying <S%G3619><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I fear <S%G5399><s%>, lest <S%G3381><s%> <S%G4458><s%>, when I come <S%G2064><s%>, I shall <S%G2147><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> find <S%G2147><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> such as <S%G3634><s%> I would <S%G2309><s%>, and that I <S%G2504><s%> shall be found <S%G2147><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> such as <S%G3634><s%> ye would <S%G2309><s%> not <S%G3756><s%>: lest <S%G3381><s%> <S%G4458><s%> there be debates <S%G2054><s%>, envyings <S%G2205><s%>, wraths <S%G2372><s%>, strifes <S%G2052><s%>, backbitings <S%G2636><s%>, whisperings <S%G5587><s%>, swellings <S%G5450><s%>, tumults <S%G181><s%>:

And lest <S%G3361><s%>, when I come <S%G2064><s%> again <S%G3825><s%>, my <S%G3450><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> will humble <S%G5013><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> among <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> that I shall bewail <S%G3996><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> have sinned already <S%G4258><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> have <S%G3340><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> repented <S%G3340><s%> of <S%G1909><s%> the uncleanness <S%G167><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> fornication <S%G4202><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> lasciviousness <S%G766><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> they have committed <S%G4238><s%>.
